{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3126582,"name":"Gideon Carleton","username":"SciborgBotanist6076","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/58f4c7/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T03:26:38.496Z","cooked":"

Hey everyone, I am currently designing our team’s intake and am thinking about using a couple Neo 550s. There is also the possibility of using 775 motors as well. what kind of RPM/gearbox ratios are standard? I am using 4" compliant wheels. I will attach an image if I can.

Another question; Should I stick with 2 motors, or go for just one?

Also, if you have ANY critiques on the design, they are welcome, it is my first time designing an intake in CAD

fcb6e149-dd6a-4aa0-a1fd-92a8515202711220×728 300 KB

With the neo 550’s you’d be safe with anything from 9:1 to 15:1. Same goes for a 775. You have a wide range as far as intakes goes. Specifically this year I’d probably be around 10:1-12:1.
